faq.title: Quick Answers
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about TRAVI
faq.whatIsTravi: What makes TRAVI different from other travel sites?
faq.whatIsTraviAnswer: TRAVI is your travel research hub, not a booking site. We provide verified, real-time information on opening hours, prices, transportation, and local tips for 3,000+ attractions. Our data is updated daily and completely unbiased — we focus on facts, not sales pitches.
faq.howManyDestinationsAnswer: We currently cover 17 major destinations: Dubai, Paris, Tokyo, New York, Barcelona, Singapore, London, Bangkok, Abu Dhabi, Amsterdam, Hong Kong, Istanbul, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Miami, Rome, and Riyadh. New cities are added based on traveler demand.
faq.isFree: Does TRAVI cost anything to use?
faq.isFreeAnswer: TRAVI is 100% free — no hidden fees, no premium tiers, no registration required. We're supported by affiliate partnerships when you book through our verified links, but this never influences our recommendations. Our priority is accurate information, not commissions.
faq.updateFrequencyAnswer: Our team verifies and updates content daily, with particular attention to opening hours, seasonal changes, and pricing. We cross-reference multiple sources and work with local contributors to ensure you're getting the most current information available.

dubai.name: Dubai

london.cardAlt: Historic Big Ben clock tower and Westminster Palace along the Thames River
london.description: Royal capital blending centuries of history with cutting-edge culture

singapore.description: Island nation pioneering sustainable urban living and cultural diversity

faq.title: Destination Guide FAQs
faq.subtitle: Your questions about TRAVI's comprehensive destination intelligence answered
faq.q1: How extensive is TRAVI's destination coverage?
faq.a1: TRAVI provides in-depth guides for major destinations across 6 continents, covering metropolitan areas, cultural sites, and natural attractions with real-time updates and local insights.
faq.q2: What makes TRAVI destination guides comprehensive?
faq.a2: Each guide features current attraction details, accommodation reviews, authentic dining recommendations, public transport navigation, seasonal weather patterns, and budget planning tools verified by local contributors.
faq.q3: How do I find specific destination information?
faq.a3: Use our intelligent search to find destinations by city name, country, landmark, or activity type. Filter results by region, climate, or travel style for personalized recommendations.
faq.a4: Our editorial team selects featured destinations based on seasonal relevance, emerging travel trends, exceptional visitor experiences, and comprehensive local infrastructure supporting diverse traveler needs.

403.title: Access Restricted
403.message: This travel content requires proper authentication or subscription. Sign in to access TRAVI's complete destination intelligence.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.message: The travel content you're looking for isn't available. It may have been moved, updated, or removed from our repository.
404.meta_title: 404 Error - Page Not Found | TRAVI Travel Information
404.meta_description: The requested travel information page cannot be found. Browse TRAVI's extensive travel content repository or search for your destination.

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.message: You've exceeded the request limit for TRAVI's travel API. Please wait a moment before accessing more destination content.

500.title: Technical Difficulties
500.message: Our travel information system is experiencing temporary issues. Our team is working to restore full access to TRAVI's content repository.
500.meta_description: TRAVI is temporarily unavailable due to technical issues. We're working to restore access to our travel information repository.

network.title: Connection Lost
network.message: Unable to reach TRAVI's travel database. Check your internet connection and try again to access our destination insights and travel information.
network.meta_description: Connection error preventing access to TRAVI travel content. Verify your internet connection to browse destination information.

maintenance.title: Scheduled Maintenance
maintenance.message: TRAVI is currently updating our travel intelligence platform to bring you enhanced destination insights and improved performance.

newsletter.title: Your Weekly Travel Briefing Awaits
newsletter.description: Curated destination insights, emerging travel trends, and expert recommendations delivered straight to your inbox. Join 50,000+ informed travelers who rely on our weekly intelligence reports.
newsletter.success: Welcome aboard! Please check your email to confirm your subscription and receive your first travel briefing.

cookies.title: Your Privacy Matters
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to deliver the best possible experience on TRAVI. These help us understand how you use our travel information platform, improve our services, and provide relevant content. By selecting "Accept All", you agree to our comprehensive cookie policy.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for TRAVI to function correctly. They enable core features like secure access, network management, and accessibility options. You cannot disable these as they are required for basic site operations.

analytics.title: Performance & Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies collect anonymous data about how visitors navigate and interact with TRAVI. We use this information to improve our travel content, optimize site performance, and understand which destinations and travel information are most valuable to our users.

marketing.title: Personalization & Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies remember your preferences and help us deliver tailored travel content, destination recommendations, and relevant third-party advertisements based on your interests and browsing behavior across TRAVI and partner sites.

home.title: Dubai Travel Guide 2024 | TRAVI - Expert Dubai Insights & Planning
home.description: Plan your Dubai journey with TRAVI's comprehensive travel intelligence. Access curated insights on Dubai's iconic landmarks, luxury hotels, world-class dining, and vibrant neighborhoods. Expert recommendations for every traveler.

attractions.title: Dubai Attractions & Activities | Must-See Sights & Hidden Gems - TRAVI
attractions.description: Navigate Dubai's premier attractions with TRAVI's expert curation. From the iconic Burj Khalifa and Dubai Mall to off-the-beaten-path souks and cultural districts. Real-time insights, booking tips, and insider access to Dubai's best experiences.

hotels.title: Dubai Hotels & Accommodations | Luxury to Budget Stays - TRAVI Guide
hotels.description: Compare Dubai's finest hotels and resorts with TRAVI's independent analysis. From opulent Jumeirah properties to boutique gems in Al Fahidi. Detailed reviews, location insights, and seasonal pricing intelligence for informed booking decisions.

dining.title: Dubai Restaurants & Dining Guide | From Street Food to Michelin Stars - TRAVI
dining.description: Navigate Dubai's dynamic culinary landscape with TRAVI's dining intelligence. Discover authentic Emirati cuisine, international fine dining, bustling food markets, and trendy cafes. Curated recommendations with booking insights and dietary considerations.

about.metaTitle: About TRAVI World | Independent Travel Information Platform
about.metaDescription: Discover TRAVI World - your independent source for comprehensive travel information, destination guides, and local insights across 16+ global cities.
about.title: Discover
about.subtitle: Your independent travel information platform providing comprehensive destination guides, local insights, and curated travel intelligence worldwide.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description: TRAVI World is an independent travel information platform dedicated to providing comprehensive, accurate, and up-to-date travel intelligence. Like a Reuters for travel, we aggregate and curate essential destination information, local insights, and practical guides to help travelers make informed decisions.
whoWeAre.highlight: We're not a travel agency or booking platform – we're your trusted source for unbiased travel information.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize travel information by providing comprehensive, accurate, and accessible destination intelligence that empowers travelers to explore the world with confidence.
mission.vision: We envision a world where every traveler has access to reliable, local-level information that transforms trips into meaningful experiences.

services.title: Comprehensive Travel Intelligence
services.description: Our editorial team curates essential information across six core categories, ensuring you have everything needed for informed travel decisions.

destinations.title: Destination Intelligence
destinations.description: In-depth guides covering culture, climate, transportation, and local customs for cities worldwide

attractions.title: Attraction Insights
attractions.description: Comprehensive information on must-see landmarks, hidden gems, and authentic local experiences

hotels.title: Accommodation Guides
hotels.description: Detailed profiles of hotels and lodging options across all budgets and travel styles

restaurants.title: Dining Intelligence
restaurants.description: Curated restaurant information from street food to fine dining, with local favorites highlighted

articles.title: Editorial Content
articles.description: Expert travel articles, destination features, and practical guides for smarter travel

news.title: Travel Updates
news.description: Real-time travel news, visa updates, and destination alerts to keep you informed

editorial.title: Editorial Independence
editorial.description: TRAVI World maintains strict editorial independence. Our content is created by travel professionals and local experts who prioritize accuracy and usefulness over commercial interests. Every piece of information undergoes rigorous fact-checking and regular updates.
editorial.affiliateDescription: While we may include affiliate links to support our operations, these partnerships never influence our editorial content. We clearly mark all affiliate relationships and maintain complete transparency about how we fund our platform.

accuracy.title: Unwavering Accuracy
accuracy.description: Every fact verified, every detail checked. We update content continuously to ensure reliability

transparency.title: Complete Transparency
transparency.description: Clear disclosure of affiliate relationships and AI-assisted content creation processes

userFocused.title: Traveler-First Approach
userFocused.description: Content designed exclusively to help travelers make confident, informed decisions

connect.title: Join Our Community
connect.description: Whether you're planning your next adventure or have feedback about our content, we'd love to hear from you. Connect with fellow travelers and stay updated on the latest destination intelligence.

contact.metaTitle: Contact TRAVI World | Travel Information Support
contact.metaDescription: Connect with TRAVI World for travel information inquiries, content feedback, or partnership opportunities. We respond within 2-3 business days.
contact.subtitle: Have questions about our travel content? Need clarification on destination information? We're here to help you navigate the world with confidence.
contact.getInTouchSubtitle: Choose the most convenient way to reach our team. We're committed to providing timely, helpful responses.
contact.howCanWeHelpSubtitle: From content corrections to partnership inquiries, we're here to assist with all aspects of our travel information platform.
contact.importantNoteSubtitle: Please review our FAQ and help sections first – you might find instant answers
contact.ourOfficeSubtitle: For official correspondence and legal matters only
contact.urgentNote: For time-sensitive matters, please include {{urgentLabel}} in your email subject line. We prioritize inquiries based on urgency and nature.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is fundamental to our mission. This policy explains how TRAVI World handles your information with complete transparency and in compliance with global privacy regulations.
